ModMetaData.name: Additional Robots
ModMetaData.author: FireFoX
ModMetaData.description:
Mod Version: 1.0.0
*** Example Load Order *** - Core - Misc. Robots - Misc. Robots++ - RF - Fishing (optional) - RimBees (optional) - Additional Robots
Adds a new kitchen-like bot type that can do fishing, and a haulerâ€“like robot that can do beekeeping.
Also allows omnibots to do the above actions.
A separate research job is also added for the beekeper bot.
